utils.traceProps¶

utils.traceProps.check_trace_input(trace)[source]¶

Validate trace input format and data type.

utils.traceProps.get_axon_count(trace)[source]¶

Count the number of connected components (axons) in the trace mask.

utils.traceProps.get_mean_axon_length(trace, pixel_length=1.0)[source]¶

Calculate mean axon length by dividing density by axon count.

utils.traceProps.get_trace_density(trace, pixel_length=1.0)[source]¶

Calculate density from a trace mask by averaging pixel values.
